室.definition: room; work unit; grave; scabbard; family or clan; one of the 28 constellations of Chinese astronomy

室女座.definition: Virgo (constellation and sign of the zodiac)

室町.definition: Muromachi bakufu, the feudal government of Japan (1338-1573) under the Ashikaga shoguns

室町幕府.definition: Muromachi bakufu, the feudal government of Japan (1338-1573) under the Ashikaga shoguns

室邇人遐.definition: to long for sb far away; to grieve over the dead

室韋.definition: the Shiwei tribes who inhabited an area to the northeast of Tang-dynasty China

室顫.definition: ventricular fibrillation (V-fib), abbr. for 心室顫動|心室颤动[xin1 shi4 chan4 dong4]
